comment: /**  * Create the ModelMBeanInfo for the given managed resource.  * @param managedBean the bean that will be exposed (might be an AOP proxy)  * @param beanKey the key associated with the managed bean  * @return the ModelMBeanInfo metadata object  * @throws JMException in case of errors  */
code: /**  * Create the ModelMBeanInfo for the given managed resource.  * @param managedBean the bean that will be exposed (might be an AOP proxy)  * @param beanKey the key associated with the managed bean  * @return the ModelMBeanInfo metadata object  * @throws JMException in case of errors  */ ModelMBeanInfo getMBeanInfo(Object managedBean, String beanKey) throws JMException.
